Review Text: Gartmore Falls is a picturesque waterfall formed by a stream flowing from Maussakelle Reservoir. It cascades down in two main segments, creating a stunning view against the backdrop of lush greenery and misty hills. The falls are part of the Gartmore Estate, a tea plantation area, and are accessible by a short hike through scenic trails. It’s a peaceful and less crowded location, making it ideal for nature lovers and hikers.
It was great, we had were able to spend in upper falls, looked incredible view from above , infinity pool can be accessible. Green lush mountains and tea plantation near by.

Gartmore Falls, near Adam’s Peak, are among the finest in Sri Lanka.  There are swimming opportunities in the pool at the top of the falls.  The best views of the falls and the reservoir below are from viewpoints in the neighbouring tea estate.  Unfortunately the owners of the tea estate are in the process of erecting a forbidding barbed wire fence to restrict access to this area.  We succeeded in persuading the security staff to allow us to walk to the viewpoints.  But others may not be so lucky.

Gartmore Falls, also known as Sri Pada Falls, is a beautiful waterfall located near Maskeliya in the central highlands of Sri Lanka. It is situated within the Gartmore Estate, a tea plantation, and offers stunning views of the surrounding tea fields and the towering Adam's Peak (Sri Pada) in the background. The waterfall is about 25 meters (82 feet) in height and cascades down a rocky slope into a serene pool. It's a less frequently visited destination compared to other popular waterfalls in Sri Lanka, making it an ideal spot for nature lovers and those looking for a peaceful retreat. Visitors often enjoy a short hike through tea plantations to reach the falls, which adds to the charm of the experience.

Review Title: Gartmore Falls: A Hidden Jewel in Sri Lanka’s Natural Wonderland
Review Text: As a tour guide with years of experience leading travelers through Sri Lanka’s diverse landscapes, I can confidently say that Gartmore Falls is one of the country’s most enchanting and often overlooked destinations. Here’s why this hidden gem deserves a spot on your travel itinerary. Gartmore Falls is a tranquil and visually stunning destination that offers a refreshing break from the more frequented tourist spots. Its natural beauty and serene environment make it a must-visit for anyone exploring Sri Lanka’s diverse landscapes. Highly recommended for those looking to connect with nature and experience a slice of Sri Lanka’s untouched beauty. #ExploreSriLanka#ScenicLankaPersonalTourDrivers
